item.title: [Pi] Unable to reach statement [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

archOption needs to equal to true or false. They way you’re using it in your error is like a boolean, however it looks like you’re using an int.

item.title: [Pi] Unable to reach statement [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I have this error whenever I compile that I can’t fix.

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:746: unreachable statement

                            if(c.archOption) {
                            ^

Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Could somebody help me fix it please :), here is the case.

case 9158: if(c.flowerOption) { c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); c.flower = new Object(-1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, false); c.flowerOption = false; } if(c.archOption) { if(c.playerMagicBook != 1) { c.sendMessage("You switch to Ancient magiks."); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.playerMagicBook = 1; } else { c.sendMessage("You switch to Modern magic."); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); c.playerMagicBook = 0; } c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); } if (c.dialogueAction == 104) { PyramidePlunder.endPyramidePlunder(c); } if(c.dialogueAction == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(40, -1); } if(c.pcOption) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(58, -1); c.pcOption = false; } if(c.beginOption) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(18, -1); c.beginOption = false; } if(c.bookSwap) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(553, 5) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(560, 5) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(563, 10)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(553, 5); c.getItems().deleteItem(560, 5); c.getItems().deleteItem(563, 10); c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.bookSwap = false; } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have the required runes to cast this spell."); } } c.dialogueAction = 0; break;

Read full topic
